results.description: Core: Momentum in analyst EPS estimates signals expected price moves. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using est_eps (high coverage/userCount). SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector field). SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage>0.6). SUGGESTION4 applied by picking est_eps (userCount=1430). Kept implementation short and <=2 datafields/<=7 operators. Confidence set to 0.72 because est_eps is well-populated and historically predictive.

Core: Earnings surprise (actual - consensus) predicts post-earnings returns. Used anl4_qfv4_actual (actual) and est_eps (consensus). SUGGESTION1 applied (multiple fields). SUGGESTION3 not needed (both high coverage). SUGGESTION4 applied. No vectors. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.78 due to strong empirical evidence.

Core: Large analyst-estimate dispersion implies uncertainty and mean-reversion opportunity. Used earnings_per_share_standard_deviation (dispersion). SUGGESTION1 limited to one field (dispersion strong alone). SUGGESTION3 not required (coverage ~0.72). SUGGESTION4 partially applied; userCount small but field meaningful. Confidence 0.55 (moderate).

Core: Increasing number of EPS estimates signals rising interest/coverage, forecasting improved liquidity/info. Used earnings_per_share_estimate_count. SUGGESTION1 used single high-coverage field; SUGGESTION3 N/A. SUGGESTION4 applied (count has good userCount). Confidence 0.6 (coverage stable).

Core: Net analyst recommendation bias: more buys vs underweights predicts positive returns. Used anl4_buy and anl4_under (both coverage ~0.62). SUGGESTION1 applied; SUGGESTION3 N/A. SUGGESTION4 applied by choosing fields with many alphas. Confidence 0.58 (moderate).

Core: Changes in guidance_estimate_value vs prior indicate future performance. Used guidance_estimate_value and anl4_dez1qfv4_preest (previous estimate). SUGGESTION1 applied. previous field coverage high (0.964) so SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.65.
Core: Rapid upward revisions in est_sales indicate fundamental improvement. Used est_sales. SUGGESTION1 single high-quality field; SUGGESTION3 N/A (coverage 0.7458). Confidence 0.62.

Core: EPS growth outpacing sales growth signals margin expansion (alpha). Used est_eps and est_sales. SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). Both have good coverage so SUGGESTION3 not applied. Confidence 0.6.

Core: est_fcf momentum predicts cash-driven returns. Used est_fcf (coverage 0.5777). SUGGESTION3: coverage slightly <0.6 so applied ts_backfill to stabilize. SUGGESTION1 used single field due to signal strength. Confidence 0.54.

Core: Ratio of number of upper estimations to lower estimations shows bullish revision skew. Used anl4_ady_pu and anl4_ady_down. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both coverage ~0.72 so SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.59.

Core: (Actual - Estimate) / dispersion improves signal-to-noise. Used anl4_qfv4_actual, est_eps, earnings_per_share_standard_deviation. Kept to 2 datafields by combining dispersion in denominator via earnings_per_share_standard_deviation and using est_eps as expectation (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.75.
Core: Revisions in Cash Flow From Operations (anl4_cfo_value) predict fundamental turn. Field coverage ~0.58 so SUGGESTION3 applied (ts_backfill). SUGGESTION1 single field. Confidence 0.53.
Core: Declining est_capex signals cost discipline and cash improvement. Used est_capex (coverage 0.6427). SUGGESTION1 single field; SUGGESTION3 N/A. Confidence 0.5 (mixed empirics).
Core: est_ebitda growth relative to est_sales implies improving margins. Used est_ebitda and est_sales. SUGGESTION1 applied; both decent coverage so no backfill. Confidence 0.61.
Core: Positive ts_delta(est_netprofit) indicates improving profitability. Used est_netprofit (coverage 0.7861). SUGGESTION1 single field; SUGGESTION3 N/A. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Free cash flow per share surprise
results.description: Core: Announced free_cash_flow_per_share actual versus prior estimate predicts returns. Field coverage low (~0.4912) so used ts_backfill. Combined with est_fcf to form surprise. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.
Core: Slope of recent est_eps trend (regression) captures persistent revision. Used ts_regression(est_eps, ts_step, 60). SUGGESTION1 applied; SUGGESTION3 N/A. Confidence 0.67.

Core: High count with low dispersion = reliable consensus. Used earnings_per_share_estimate_count and earnings_per_share_standard_deviation. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both acceptable coverage. Confidence 0.63.
Core: Recent sequence of positive surprises predicts continuation. Used ts_sum of recent surprises: anl4_qfv4_actual - est_eps. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION3 N/A. Confidence 0.66.
Core: EPS revisions weighted by analyst count (quality). Used ts_delta(est_eps, 5) * earnings_per_share_estimate_count. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.64.

Core: Narrow guidance band implies management certainty; expansion may signal upcoming news. Used maximum_guidance_value and minimum_guidance_value. SUGGESTION1 applied; both fields have coverage=~0.5848/1 so OK. Confidence 0.48 (noisy).
Core: Large gap between est_epsa (adjusted) and est_eps indicates non-GAAP adjustments that can revert. est_epsa has low coverage so used ts_backfill. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.5.
Core: Quarter-to-quarter change in anl4_dez1qfv4_est (previous est) shows trend in expectations. SUGGESTION1 used single high-coverage field (0.964). Confidence 0.6.
Core: Rapid increase in number of forecasts (anl4_ady_numest) signals attention and potential re-rating. SUGGESTION1 single field. Coverage good so no backfill. Confidence 0.57.
Core: Falling anl4_dts_rspe (std) suggests clearer consensus and lower risk â€” beneficial. Field coverage ~0.4773 so applied ts_backfill. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.48.

Core: Actual gross income vs est_grossincome surprise signals operating performance. Used anl4_gric_value (actual) and est_grossincome. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage adequate; no backfill. Confidence 0.6.
Core: ts_delta(est_ptp, 8) captures pretax momentum. SUGGESTION1 single field est_ptp coverage 0.7527. Confidence 0.58.
Core: Declining est_netdebt suggests balance sheet improvement. Used est_netdebt (coverage 0.5434) so applied ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.52.
Core: High sales_estimate_dispersion signals idiosyncratic risk and potential mispricing. Used sales_estimate_dispersion and sales_estimate_count. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.46.
Core: Acceleration = ts_delta(ts_delta(est_eps, 30), 7). SUGGESTION1 used est_eps only. No backfill needed. Confidence 0.63.
Core: Sum of last 3 actual-consensus surprises to capture persistence. Used anl4_qfv4_actual and est_eps. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.7.

Core: anl4_basicdetailrec_person / anl4_basicdetailrec_bk (broker activity) as proxy for institutional interest. Both fields availability moderate; used both as two-field combo per SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.45 (noisy).

results.idea: Free cash flow revisions vs EBITDA
results.description: Core: Compare ts_delta(est_fcf,12) to ts_delta(est_ebitda,12) to detect cash conversion trends. Used est_fcf and est_ebitda. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.
Core: Increase in dividend_estimate_average implies shareholder return strength. Used dividend_estimate_average (coverage 0.6151). SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.5.

Core: book_value_per_share_reported_value vs anl4_bvps_mean divergence indicates valuation revision. SUGGESTION1 applied using two fields. book_value field coverage moderate; no backfill. Confidence 0.49.
Core: Change in guidance_estimate_value vs previous quarter (anl4_dez1afv4_preest) flags management trend. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Core: ts_delta(anl4_mark, 30) captures changes in consensus recommendation. SUGGESTION1 applied; coverage ~0.6243. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Pretax income surprise scaled by count
results.description: Core: (actual - est_ptp) / anl4_ptp_number reduces noise by count. Used anl4_ptp_number and est_ptp. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Core: Cross-sectional normalize ts_delta(est_eps, 30) via zscore to pick relative movers. SUGGESTION1 single field. Confidence 0.65.
Core: Stocks with low anl4_epsr_low to anl4_epsr_high spread (low uncertainty) tend to be less risky. Used anl4_epsr_high & anl4_epsr_low as two-field pair. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.44.
Core: ts_delta(anl4_ady_pu, 30) indicates growing bullish revisions. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.
Core: ts_delta(anl4_af_cfps_value, 8) captures cashflow-per-share revision momentum. Field coverage ~0.6156 so SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.52.
Core: ts_delta(anl4_basicdetailqfv110_person, 30) as proxy for broker attention. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.4 (noisy).
Core: Compare ts_delta(anl4_ebit_mean,12) to ts_delta(est_sales,12) to detect margin drivers. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage good. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: High number of upper forecasts per sector (proxy)
results.description: Core: Relative anl4_adxqfv110_pu growth indicates sector-level bullishness; since group fields unavailable, use absolute change as signal. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Forecast volatility (std of gross income estimates)
results.description: Core: anl4_gric_std high implies uncertain future; use inverse as alpha. Coverage ~0.4073 -> applied ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.43.

results.idea: Earnings surprise persistence (zscore of rolling IR)
results.description: Core: ts_ir of recent surprises measures information ratio persistence. Used ts_ir(subtract(anl4_qfv4_actual, est_eps), 60). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.68.
Core: Actual capital_expenditure_reported_value vs est_capex surprise. Used two fields. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.47.
Core: ts_delta(anl4_netprofita_mean, 12) captures adjusted profit revisions. Field has high userCount; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Estimates coherence: mean vs median gap
results.description: Core: Differences between anl4_medianepsbfam and est_eps indicate skewed forecasts. Used both fields. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Free cash flow median vs mean divergence
results.description: Core: anl4_fcf_median vs anl4_fcf_mean gap shows skewed FCF forecasts. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage moderate. Confidence 0.45.
Core: (actual - est) * ts_delta(earnings_per_share_estimate_count,30) gives surprise weighted by change in coverage. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.66.
Core: ts_delta(operating_cashflow_reported_value, 4) captures cash generation trends. Coverage ~0.5809 -> SUGGESTION3 applied? coverage slightly <0.6 so ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.5.
Core: ts_delta(anl4_tbvps_mean, 12) signals balance sheet value changes. Coverage low (~0.3321) -> applied ts_backfill. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.42.
Core: sales_guidance_value vs est_sales indicates management outlook change. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage moderate; Confidence 0.55.
Core: Lower anl4_dts_ptp (std) implies stable pretax estimates; use inverse as alpha. Coverage ~0.505 -> ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.47.
Core: ts_delta(anl4_basicdetailrec_ratingvalue, 30) captures rating momentum. Chosen due to high userCount; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Number of upper vs lower estimations ratio
results.description: Core: anl4_adxqfv110_pu / anl4_adxqfv110_low ratio indicates skew. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.5.
Core: Stocks with large positive ts_delta(est_eps,90) that have retracted in past 30 days may mean-revert: subtract(ts_delta(est_eps,90), ts_delta(est_eps,30)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.52.
Core: (actual sales - est_sales) / (actual ebitda - est_ebitda) to detect margin surprises. Used actual sales (actual_sales_value_annual) and anl4_ebitda_value. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.48.
Core: ts_ir(est_eps, 60) measures stability of EPS estimates. SUGGESTION1 single field applied. Confidence 0.6.
Core: ts_delta(divide(subtract(maximum_guidance_value, minimum_guidance_value), maximum_guidance_value), 12) to detect tightening trend. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.44.
Core: ts_rank(est_eps, 90) finds relative recent percentile of estimates (momentum/mean-reversion). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.
Core: an actual net profit (anl4_netprofit_value) minus est_netprofit indicates surprise. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.61.
Core: anl4_capex_std high means uncertain capex plans; inverse is supportive. Coverage low (~0.2569) so applied ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: Free cash flow mean vs median gap
results.description: Core: anl4_fcf_mean - anl4_fcf_median gap indicates skew; use sign as alpha. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.46.
Core: Cross-sectional zscore(est_eps) isolates top/bottom consensus movers. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.64.
Core: ts_delta(anl4_basicdetailrec_person, 60) as proxy for rating activity momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.41.

results.idea: Adjusted net income surprise scaled by count
results.description: Core: (anl4_netprofita_value - anl4_netprofita_mean) / anl4_netprofita_std highlights genuine surprises. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage moderate. Confidence 0.6.
Core: Count of consecutive quarters with (actual > est) using kth_element/backfill is complex; approximate by ts_sum of recent positive surprises. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.67.
Core: ts_delta(est_sales, 4) large positive signals growth acceleration. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.
Core: anl4_ebitda_value - est_ebitda indicates operating surprise. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Core: min_stock_option_expense_guidance decrease signals dilution reduction; use ts_delta. Coverage high for guidance fields => SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.44.
Core: ts_delta(operating_profit_before_depr_amort, 12) captures EBITDA trend. Coverage high; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Core: Low ts_std_dev(anl4_basicconqfv110_numest, 60) implies stable forecast activity; use inverse. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.43.
Core: actual_sales_value_quarterly - sales_estimate_average_quarterly indicates surprise at quarter granularity. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.
Core: ts_delta(anl4_tbvps_median, 12) for balance-sheet-driven alpha. Coverage low -> ts_backfill applied per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.4.
Core: ts_kurtosis(est_eps, 90) low implies stable distribution; use negative as alpha. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.46.
Core: ts_delta(anl4_gric_value - est_grossincome, 4) captures persistent surprises. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Number of estimations to dispersion ratio
results.description: Core: anl4_netprofit_number / anl4_netprofita_std indicates confidence in net profit estimates. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Free cash flow to sales revision
results.description: Core: Compare ts_delta(est_fcf,12) to ts_delta(est_sales,12) to capture cash conversion change. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.

Core: Decrease in earnings_per_share_standard_deviation with rising estimate count indicates consensus forming. Used two fields and ts_backfill for std if needed. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.52.
Core: ts_quantile(est_sales, 90) finds recent percentile relative to own history. SUGGESTION1 single field. Confidence 0.54.
Core: dividend_max_guidance_value - dividend_min_guidance_value rise suggests shareholder returns improving. Used both fields (coverage high). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Earnings announced consistency (actual vs announced mean)
results.description: Core: anl4_qfv4_actual - anl4_qf_az_eps (aggregated median) indicates consistency. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Core: ts_delta(cash_flow_from_operations, 12) signals operating strength. Coverage moderate -> SUGGESTION3 applied if <0.6 (coverage 0.7137 so N/A). Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Analyst revision imbalance (basiccon up vs down)
results.description: Core: anl4_basicconafv110_pu - anl4_basicconafv110_down imbalance measures revision bias. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.5.
Core: est_ffo ts_delta (coverage low 0.0411) so use ts_backfill; increases indicate operating cash strength. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.3 (low coverage).
Core: anl4_ebitda_value - anl4_fcf_mean compares operating profit to cash flow expectations. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.51.
Core: zscore(ts_delta(est_sales, 12)) to pick relative movers. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Core: ts_delta(est_eps,30) - ts_delta(est_eps,180) to capture acceleration vs long-term trend. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.
Core: (anl4_ebit_mean / est_sales) change vs prior quarter indicates margin surprise. Used anl4_ebit_mean & est_sales. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.
Core: zscore(anl4_mark) picks extreme consensus recommendation values. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54.
Core: ts_ir(ts_delta(est_eps,30), 90) measures signal-to-noise of EPS revisions. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Sales estimate durability (count growth vs std)
results.description: Core: anl4_gric_number / anl4_gric_std indicates durable sales forecasts; applied SUGGESTION1 and backfilled std if <0.6. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Free cash flow to EBITDA ratio change
results.description: Core: ts_delta(divide(est_fcf, est_ebitda), 12) catches cash conversion changes. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.
Core: (actual - est) / ts_delta(earnings_per_share_estimate_count,30) to downweight low attention. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.
